715420.name: Silicon Zeroes - Original Soundtrack
715420.description:
The official soundtrack to Silicon Zeroes: 10 tracks with over 35 minutes of high-definition, lossless music by Craig Barnes.

The music of Silicon Zeroes is ever-changing. By continuously combining and recombining layers, no two playthroughs sound exactly the same. This version of the soundtrack represents one of many possible arrangements you might hear in the game.
